fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Monopoly: If you survive to see the end of the game, you will become the only winner (barring players that have already met their win condition). You win with nobody except Outsider Destructives/Outsider King (+Advisor if applicable).
- Foreclosure: At the start of D5, or when a faction is one death away from victory, everyone will be notified that there is a Mountebank. If neither of these conditions are met and a faction would normally win, your victory will be extended by *1 phase*, and everyone will be notified that there is a Mountebank. You then gain 1 Special of your choice. 
- Wealthy: Whenever a Room requires Card Points to use, you hold 2 Card Points available for spend. 
- Investor: Whenever you trade away cards, you will gain exact copies of the ones you traded in the next phase.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Reserves: Gain a non-Special card of your choice. [Infinite, 2 CD]
- Collections: Steal 1 random card from everyone in the game. [1 use, Unique, Astral]
- Slink: Appear as a different role for the rest of the phase. Affects up to Uncertain checks. [3 uses]

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Survive to see the end of the game.
